title: Jr One Bedroom Living, Simple, Stylish, Spacious.
neighborhood: Kent WA. Down Town Kent, Bus line, Kent Station, I-5, 167
posting_body: We are open Monday through Friday 9-6 and Saturday 9-5:30.
Please call us to schedule a tour!!
Apply today and get $300.00 off your first full month’s rent with a 15-month lease!
This is a Jr. 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 550 Sq.
Welcome to Signature Pointe, where quality and comfort meet.

Offering an exquisite collection of Studio, One Bedroom, Two Bedroom, and Three Bedroom Apartment Residences ranging in size from 378-1300 square feet, defined by modern amenities, each gorgeous apartment home boasts a designer fully equipped kitchen, over-sized walk-in closets in most bedrooms, laundry area with washer and dryer in every home, and a private patio or balcony.
Signature Pointe is designed to impress and appeal to your sense of style and sophistication.

Whether you enjoy casual or fine dining at Kent’s local restaurants or taking a relaxing stroll through the Green River/Inter-Urban trail or nearby parks, our community keeps you close to the action while also delivering a relaxing retreat for times when you just want to unwind.
Choose Signature Pointe as your new home today.

Our GORGEOUS apartment community enjoys a prime location in the valley of Kent that is only 25 minutes to downtown Seattle, 15 minutes to Sea-Tac airport, and just minutes to Kent Station and transit center.

Our residents enjoy a resort-style amenity package which includes an indoor and an outdoor pool pavilion with grilling areas, fitness center, yoga studio, tanning, indoor basketball court, dry sauna, tennis court, covered picnic areas, playground, and much more!
Call today for a personalized tour of our beautiful community!
Signature Pointe is located in Kent, Washington in the 98032-zip code.
This apartment community has 47 beautiful acres.
Rental rates, availability, specials and lease terms are subject to change daily without notice.
Deposits may fluctuate based on credit, rental history, income, and/or other qualifying standards.
